description: This table contains information related to a financial assistance program tracker record.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_TRACKER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the financial assistance program tracker record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the record status (hidden, soft-deleted, etc...)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: FIN_ASST_PROGRAM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the financial assistance program that is associated with this tracker record.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_PROGRAM_ID_PROGRAM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the financial assistance program record.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_CASE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the financial assistance case associated with the program tracker.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient associated with this tracker record.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the status of a financial assistance program tracker record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Pending


Approved


Denied


Waiting for supervisor's approval


Pending Appeal


Overturned


Inactive


Entered in Error


Signed


Needs Review

columns.name: DECISION_DATE
columns.description: Stores the decision date once the tracker has been approved or denied. The date on which a decision is taken whether to approve or deny the financial assistance program tracker.

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The date from which this approved financial assistance program tracker is effective.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: The date until which this approved financial assistance program tracker is effective.

columns.name: LETTER_SENT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the status of an approval or denial letter sent for a tracker.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Sent


Not Sent


In Progress

columns.name: APPL_RECVD_DATE
columns.description: Date the application was submitted. May or may not be the same date the application was entered as a tracker.

columns.name: PROGRAM_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source classification of the entity providing funding for the financial assistance program.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PROGRAM_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The method used by the assistance program to provide financial assistance to the patient (e.g. Free drug, co-pay card).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Free Drug


Stock Replacement


Grant


Co-Pay Card

columns.name: DENIAL_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the reason why a financial assistance tracker is denied.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Over Income Threshold


Incomplete Application or Documentation


Qualified for Other Assistance Programs


Qualified for Medicaid


Automatically Denied

columns.name: APPROVAL_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the amount, type, or level of approval for a financial assistance program tracker.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Full Approval


80 Percent approval


Half Approval

columns.name: TOTAL_APPROVED_AMOUNT
columns.description: The total amount of aid approved for a financial assistance program.

columns.name: PENDING_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the coverage auto-created for the tracker.

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_DATE
columns.description: Date on which a user should follow-up for the tracker.
